{"id":602657373,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1639649885,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"23 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/602657373/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"17.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isToeplitzMatrix(vector<vector<int>>& matrix) {\n        \n        int r = matrix.size();\n        int c = matrix[0].size();\n        \n        for(int i =0 ;i<r;i++){\n            for(int j =0 ;j<c ;j++){\n                if(i > 0 && j> 0 && matrix[i][j] != matrix[i-1][j-1]){\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix"}
